ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Do you currently have a driver's license?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 2 = No, I never had one; 3 = No, I had one but it expired; 4 = No, it is suspended; 5 = No, it is revoked

ElementDescription: If you do not currently have a driver's license, why not?
Notes: 1= no access to car; 2= my license is suspended; 3= my license was revoked; 4= other

ElementDescription: If other, please specify:
Have you driven a motor vehicle at all in the past 12 months?
DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU: Drive within an hour or so after drinking 1 or 2 alcoholic drinks?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= 1-3 times; 2= 4-7 times; 3= 8-11 times; 4= Once a month; 5= 2-3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2-3 times a week; 8= 4-6 times a week; 9= Once a day; 10= More than once a day

ElementDescription: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU: Drive within an hour or so after drinking 3 or more alcoholic drinks?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= 1-3 times; 2= 4-7 times; 3= 8-11 times; 4= Once a month; 5= 2-3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2-3 times a week; 8= 4-6 times a week; 9= Once a day; 10= More than once a day

ElementDescription: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU: Drive when you knew your drinking had affected your coordination?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= 1-3 times; 2= 4-7 times; 3= 8-11 times; 4= Once a month; 5= 2-3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2-3 times a week; 8= 4-6 times a week; 9= Once a day; 10= More than once a day

ElementDescription: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU: Drink in the car while you were driving?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= 1-3 times; 2= 4-7 times; 3= 8-11 times; 4= Once a month; 5= 2-3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2-3 times a week; 8= 4-6 times a week; 9= Once a day; 10= More than once a day

ElementDescription: How many drinks does it take before your driving ability is impaired?
Notes: 1= One; 2= Two; 3= Three; 4= Four; 5= Five; 6= Six; 7= Seven; 8= Eight; 9= Nine; 10= Ten; 11= More than ten

ElementDescription: Do you ever drink with friends?
Does anyone ever serve as a designated driver?
How often do you serve as the designated driver?
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Once in a while; 3= Often; 4= Very often

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, have you had any traffic accidents while you were driving (even minor ones like a fender bender or ones where the police were not involved)?
How many different traffic accidents have you had in the past 12 months while you were driving?
How many of these accident occurred after you had been drinking?
In the past 12 months, have you received any tickets for traffic violations (speeding, driving through a red light)? Do not include parking tickets
How many tickets have you received for traffic violations in the last 12 months?
What were the tickets for? Select all that apply
Notes: 1= Speeding; 2= Driving through a red light; 3= Driving through a stop sign; 4= Driving under the influence of alcohol or other substances; 5= Driving without a valid license; 6= Reckless driving; 7= Other (please specify)

ElementDescription: If other, please specify:
How many of these tickets were received after you had been drinking?
In the past 12 months, how often have you... Driven a motor vehicle? (car, truck, motorcycle)
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Less than once a week; 2= 1 to 3 times a week; 3= 4 to 6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how often have you... Driven without a license?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Less than once a week; 2= 1 to 3 times a week; 3= 4 to 6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: Did you drive a motorcycle at all in the past 12 months?
Do you wear a helmet when you drive your motorcycle?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Almost Never; 2= Some of the time; 3= Most of the time; 4= Almost always; 5= Always

ElementDescription: Do you wear a seatbelt when you drive a car?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Almost Never; 2= Some of the time; 3= Most of the time; 4= Almost always; 5= Always

Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; 2= Never had a license

ElementDescription: How many times has it been suspended?

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days: On the most recent time that you deliberately avoided driving after drinking, how did you do it; that is, what did you do instead?
Notes: 1= Was already at home, stay home; 2= Called a cab; 3= Used Ridesharing Serivce; 4= User Public Transportation; 5= Used a Designated Driver; 6= Stayed overnight as a guest; 7= Waited to leave until after the effects of alcohol wore off; 8= Walked; 9= Other (Specify)
